description: [Mustard Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1020) has acquired servers to host second-stage payloads that remain active for a period of either days, weeks, or months.(Citation: SentinelOne SocGholish Infrastructure November 2022)

external_references.description: Milenkoski, A. (2022, November 7). SocGholish Diversifies and Expands Its Malware Staging Infrastructure to Counter Defenders. Retrieved March 22, 2024.
